summary: We reviewed federal funding provided to various organizations, including Federally Qualified Health Centers, Planned Parenthood Federation of America, and International Planned Parenthood Federation. The organizations included in our review provide health-related services, including services related to family planning and sexual and reproductive health. In total, these organizations received almost $16 billion through Department of Health and Human Services or U.S. Agency for International Development grants...
title: Health Care Funding: Federal Obligations to and Funds Received by Certain Organizations Involved in Health-Related Services, 2016 through 2018
